meanings.definition: A bar at the edge of a computer screen where open programs and icons are displayed.
meanings.sent1: The taskbar at the bottom of the screen shows all the programs I have open.
meanings.sent2: I always keep my taskbar visible so I can easily switch between different applications.
meanings.sent3: When my cat walked across the keyboard, the taskbar disappeared, and chaos ensued.
meanings.sent4: The taskbar is like a busy city street, with icons and programs moving around constantly.
meanings.sent5: The taskbar is like a helpful guide, showing me where to find my open programs.

meanings.definition: A bar used to switch between open applications on a computer.
meanings.sent1: Clicking on an icon in the taskbar quickly switches me to another program.
meanings.sent2: I find it convenient to have the taskbar at the bottom of my screen for easy access.
meanings.sent3: My friend jokingly called the taskbar a magic wand for switching between apps.
meanings.sent4: The taskbar acts like a traffic controller, smoothly directing me to different applications.
meanings.sent5: The taskbar is my shortcut to navigate between various open applications.

meanings.definition: A bar that contains the Start button and system tray on a Windows operating system.
meanings.sent1: The taskbar on my Windows computer is where I find the Start button.
meanings.sent2: I customized my taskbar to include only the icons I use frequently.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dragged an icon off the taskbar, and it vanished into digital oblivion.
meanings.sent4: The taskbar is like the control center of my computer, housing essential functions.
meanings.sent5: The taskbar is like a digital hub, connecting me to various tools and settings.
